sentences.en: The Protoceratops had a frill on its head.
sentences.cn: 原角龙的头上有一个褶边。

sentences.en: The coat is very abundant on the mane and frill.
sentences.cn: 鬃毛和饰毛的毛发都非常丰富。

sentences.en: When in repose the ears are folded lengthwise and thrown back into the frill.
sentences.cn: 休息时，耳朵向前折叠，呈半立耳姿态。
